attributes.action: The 2016 referendum was non binding leave 37%, yet 62% did not vote for it
attributes.background: electoral commisions figures for the 2016 EU Referendum ( electorate 2016 = 46,500.001 - leave voters 17,410,742 = 29,089,259 ) as such the imposition of brexit is inherently undemocratic and denies the majority of voters representation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you want the UK Government or Parliament to do. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like a "super majority" and a cooling off period for referendums you might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245856
